title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Flagler Health+
Interview Descriptions: Approximately two weeks after online application, I received for in person interview The interview was conducted by Administrator and Clinical RN supervisor Questioned regarding how to handle differences between employees. Reviewed work history
Interview Questions: Example of budget experience and outcome

title: Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Flagler Health+
Interview Descriptions: Met with manager, informal interview, standard questions.   Job was not what they posted, took a minute to process this information and move forward.   We told I would have follow up meeting with rest of team three times via email.  Never happened, finally recieved letter stating they chose another candidate.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your job resposibilities at.....

title: Food Service Worker Interview
Interview Descriptions: In person and misleading. Not professional and began late. Low entry pay and low experienced pay. Don’t suggest to anyone. Took 18 days to lock in date me time for interview.
Interview Questions: Have you worked in a hospital before?

title: ER Crisis Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Flagler Health+
Interview Descriptions: I have been pursuing a position with Flagler for several months.  I attended two jobs fairs where the advertisement stated "Come have a chance to meet with department heads" basically arriving to large empty room, on both occasions.. Received a call asking for a return call for interview. When I returned the call, the hiring manger of the ER, to arrange interview stated they call too many people to interview, sorry.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Flagler Health+
Interview Descriptions: Online application, one interview with the director of the department in which I applied for. The interview was very informal and we spent most of the time talking about our children.
Interview Questions: Why do I want to work at Flagler?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: short and brief, well designed.  what more do you want me to say?  average interview program. Lets get to the next question!  this is taking too long.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work here

title: Microbiologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: scheduling the interview in person, going to their human resource department, filling out application and showing proof of education and licensure, providing picture that I was a United States citizen, meeting a group of administrators who asks me questions and give me scenarios as to how I would handle certain situations.
Interview Questions: was I willing to work weekends

title: IT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Palm Coast, FL) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Received a call within a couple days, entire process took about 3 weeks. I was asked irrelevant questions that had nothing to do with the job. I was more than qualified for the job.
Interview Questions: what car would I buy if I had 20,000$

title: Patient Registration Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Manager was very nice and  with me having great customer service  skills and knowledge i was hired in 15 minutes  the one on one interview basically just to touch base with one another and meet and get my hired in.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: It was a close interview with several personal from the offices, where each staff member ask about three questions, an ask that I give a brief about myself, part of the interview process was an overall view of the pharmacy and what I would be doing
Interview Questions: what asset would I bring to the pharmacy

title: Gift Shop Cashier Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Meet with the Gift Shop manager and the Volunteer Coordinator for an informal conversation type interview. Most of the interview was informational about how the shop operates and the clientele. There was some embarrassment from the Volunteer Coordinator about the rate of pay. Very little was about qualifications for the job giving me the feeling that it was just a formality and the job was filled.
Interview Questions: Give an example of a time you gave exceptional customer service.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in Jun 2011
Interview Descriptions: Very brief, spoke mostly about personal expectations. Department director was late and very unprofessional in spoken words, attire, and the general way in which they conducted them-self. The interview itself was easier than expected but, I was questioning at the end if I wanted to accept a job at a facility that would put this person in charge of a whole department!!! Write down everything negotiated and discussed. I was promised a certain schedule and time off which I never got.
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to work on that specific unit

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was called in shortly after graduating from Nursing school  and interviewed directly with the floor supervisor.  The process was incredibly informal and took less than an hour.  I was offered a position immediately following the interview and began work the very next week.  Very simple process.
Interview Questions: How did you hear about us? What are your goals? are you available to be on-call? do you have any other health care experience?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Flagler Health+ (Saint Augustine, FL) in Jun 2009
Interview Descriptions: One interview conducted by the Director of Nursing for that particular floor.
Interview Questions: The Director of the floor referred to me by the wrong name throughout the entire inteveriew.
